title: Exclusive Waterfront Stay at Lake Wanaka, NZ
description: Enjoy a dreamy stay at the Edgewater, the only hotel located on the shores of New Zealand’s beautiful Lake Wanaka. Stunning views of the azure water and the magnificent Southern Alps await at this relaxing resort, which offers a multitude of outdoor activities. Daily breakfast, a welcome drink and half-day bike hire are all included in this peaceful escape.

title: Lake Wanaka's Only Waterfront Hotel with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Escape to the dreamy Edgewater Hotel, the only boutique retreat located directly on the shores of New Zealand’s picturesque Lake Wanaka, with stunning views of the azure water and the magnificent Southern Alps. Located in the picturesque town of Wanaka in Central Otago - easily reachable in just one hour from Queenstown - the hotel is the perfect launchpad to enjoy the natural beauty of the South Island. You’ll also be ideally located just a short drive from world-class skiing in the Treble Cone ski fields, making this escape perfect for ski-lovers.

Choose to stay in a modern hotel room for two or in a spacious one-bedroom apartment with sweeping views, and enjoy easy access to a world of outdoor activities - explore hundreds of kilometres of hiking or biking trails, kayak on crystal-clear waters, wander the small-town streets and indulge in fresh local produce, then return to unwind by the lake.

title: Lake Wanaka's Only Waterfront Hotel with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Enjoy a dreamy stay at Edgewater Hotel, the only property located directly on the shores of New Zealand’s picturesque Lake Wanaka - and just a short drive from world-class skiing in the Treble Cone ski fields. Immerse yourself in the breathtaking natural beauty of the Central Otago region and take in stunning views of the azure water and the magnificent Southern Alps.

Whether you choose a stay in a modern hotel room for two or in a spacious one-bedroom apartment, you will wake up every morning to breathtaking lake views, with access to numerous outdoor activities. Your exquisite lakefront escape includes delicious daily breakfast, a nightly drink per person, and a leisurely late, guaranteed 1pm checkout.

**Ski package upgrades:** Ski on some of New Zealand's best mountains with a ski season upgrade: take your pick from Queenstown's iconic Coronet Peak and The Remarkables, or head to Wanaka's nearby Treble Cone and Cardrona.
